verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Dying with Jesus, by death reckoned mine, Living With Jesus a new life divine, Looking to Jesus ‘til glory doth shine, Moment by Moment, O Lord, I am Thine.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Never a trial that He is not there, Never a burden That He doth not bear, Never a sorrow that He doth not share, Moment By moment, I’m under His care.{/lang-eng}
